info.description:
This is a Job Data Exchange (JDX) Job Description server. You can find
out more 
[https://www.uschamberfoundation.org/jdk](https://www.uschamberfoundation.org/jdk)
info.title: Job Data Exchange - Job Description API

tags.name: jobdescription
tags.description: A job description is a comprehensive set of data elements that fully characterize a position, even in relation to other positions within the company.

parameters.name: normalize_to_context
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the job description should be normalized to the provided context or kept as is

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Uri safe string pointing to the json-ld context to normalize to

parameters.name: keep_only_context_terms
parameters.description: If true then retain only the job description keys that are included in the context as terms. If false then job description keys not matching the context are kept.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the API to utilize for this request. If no version is provided the most recent version is used. Version are of the format `vX.Y`, with prefix 'v', X as major and Y as minor version number.

requestBody.description: json compatiable payload (typically a json-ld formated job description)

201.description: A job description reference was created and that reference provided in this response. Note that the reference may refer to an object that is still being created. Objects that are still being created are only available after creation has completed. Otherwise some kind of pending indicator will be given.

400.description: Bad parameter(s) provided and/or missing from your request

422.description: Job Description was unable to be normalized due to backend processing error. No client side error.

get.summary: Get data, specified by parameter, from a given job description

parameters.name: jd_id
parameters.description: Specifies an unique job description by jd_id

parameters.name: context_completeness
parameters.description: Compute the overlap coefficient of the context terms and job description keys, taken as sets. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Overlap_coefficient for more details.

201.description: A reference was created and that reference provided in this response. Note that the reference may refer to an object that is still being created. Objects that are still being created are only available after creation has completed. If object is still being created then some kind of pending indicator will be given.

400.description: Bad parameter(s) provided and/or missing from your request

422.description: Process failed due to backend processing error. No client side error.

JobDescription.description: A job description to manipulate and/or add

scopes.write:jd: modify a job description in your account
modify a job description in your account
